Class ResourceGroupImpl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, Resource.DefinitionWithRegion<ResourceGroup.DefinitionCreatable>, Resource.DefinitionWithTags<ResourceGroup.DefinitionCreatable>, Resource.UpdateWithTags<ResourceGroup.Update>, Appliable<ResourceGroup>, Creatable<ResourceGroup>, Indexable, Refreshable<ResourceGroup>, Updatable<ResourceGroup.Update>, Wrapper<ResourceGroupInner>, ResourceGroup, ResourceGroup.DefinitionBlank, ResourceGroup.DefinitionCreatable, ResourceGroup.Update

    public class ResourceGroupImpl
extends CreatableImpl<ResourceGroup,ResourceGroupInner>
implements ResourceGroup, ResourceGroup.DefinitionBlank, ResourceGroup.DefinitionCreatable, ResourceGroup.Update
    An instance of this class provides access to a resource group in Azure.
